Welcome to The Game Arcade

The arcade consists of three levels. The goal is to complete all three levels to become the ultimate champion. Each level will test your skills.

Level 1 is a Blackjack game and instructions on how to play the game can be found once the game is loaded. The game mainly focuses on your decision making, win 3 games and you can then proceed to Level 2.

Level 2 is a Trivia game. You choose a category and difficulty level before the game is started. The game consists of 10 different questions and you will have 20 seconds to answer each question. The game mainly focuses on how good your knowledge is, answer 6 questions and you can then proceed to Level 3.

Level 3 is coming soon.
